title: Asian Prawn and Noodle Soup
ingredients: ['1 dessertspoon vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon minced fresh root ginger', '1 pinch dried crushed chillies', '2L (3 pints) chicken stock', '100g (4 oz) diagonally sliced carrots', '100g (4 oz) diagonally sliced celery', '100g (4 oz) mange-tout', '350g (12 oz) fresh prawns, peeled and deveined', '100g (4 oz) rice noodles', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1/4 teaspoon white pepper']
